title: #7 The Boy in the Attic
itunes:title: #7 The Boy in the Attic
itunes:subtitle: A Satanic Murder in the Suburbs
description:
https://www.reallifeghoststoriespodcast.com


The horrific true murder of a boy killed in a satanic ritual; a story never reported by the media and remarkably relatively unknown. 


Podcast Promo: Paranonsence Broadcasting Station 


Research Book: The Boy in the Attic - David Malone



Ghost Story by Kevin MacLeod is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution licence (https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/)

Source: http://incompetech.com/music/royalty-free/index.html?isrc=USUAN1300034

Artist: http://incompetech.com/


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
